desc: Scent Legends specialise in rare and sold out vintage and haute perfumes, essential oils, oud oil from vendors such as Ensar Oud, Oriscent, Agar Aura, Arabian Oud, agarwood, blends, mukhallats, pre-reformulated perfumes of the highest quality. It offers them directly or through its marketplace for 3rd party sellers.

layout.text: EXPLORE OVER ONE HUNDRED VINTAGE OUDS
